title: Sticky Note Wish ( Định Mệnh Anh Yêu Em OST -  Giấy ghi chú tâm nguyện)
lyrics: Yi tian yi tian tie jin ni de xin ni kai xin wo guan xin Yi dian yi di wo dou neng gan ying ni shi wo zui mei de xiang xin Deng bu dao shuang zi zuo liu xin yu sa man tian jin Xian dian ran jiu zhi xian nu bang dai ti Zui can lan bu yi ding yao xu duo zhuan shi huang jin Kan ni yan jing you xin fu de dao ying Ba ni de tao yan zhuan ji bian song dao tian bian Ping fan de sha shi yong le xin bian cheng jing dian Zui lang man de xin yuan bian li tie tie cheng wu xian Jiu shi wo men zui fu you de xuan yan Ba ni de xi huan mei yi tian fu xi liang bian Jing xi de yu yan wo de tian tong tong ling yan Ni he wo de xin yuan bian li tie tie xin li mian Shou ji gan dong gei yi hou huai nian    Deng bu dao shuang zi zuo liu xin yu sa man tian jin Xian dian ran jiu zhi xian nu bang dai ti Zui can lan bu yi ding yao xu duo zhuan shi huang jin Kan ni yan jing you xin fu de dao ying Ba ni de tao yan zhuan ji bian song dao tian bian Ping fan de sha shi yong le xin bian cheng jing dian Zui lang man de xin yuan bian li tie tie cheng wu xian Jiu shi wo men zui fu you de xuan yan Ba ni de xi huxan mei yi tian fu xi liang bian Jing xi de yu yan wo de tian tong tong ling yan Ni he wo de xin yuan bian li tie tie xin li mian Shou ji gan dong gei yi hou huai nian Ba ni de tao yan zhuan ji bian song dao tian bian Ping fan de sha shi yong le xin bian cheng jing dian Zui lang man de xin yuan bian li tie tie cheng wu xian Jiu shi wo men zui fu you de xuan yan Ba ni de xi huan mei yi tian fu xi liang bian Jing xi de yu yan duo wei ni ti zao ling yan Ni he wo de xin yuan bian li tie tie xin li mian Shou ji gan dong gei yi hou huai nian
